Below are images of ninth grade projects that have been completed over this semester. Underneath the images are reviews given by the students of DVC. The images are clickable. Click on the images to see further information about the project. Some of the information listed on the following pages include the rubric, driving question and deliverables.





I honestly enjoyed this project a lot. It gave me the chance to learn more about the importance of green spaces and how I can contribute to the bettering of my earth. I was also greatful that I was able to be hands on when it came to creating a greenspace my freshman year.
-Jennifer Johnson(Class of 2018)







I thought it was a fun way to express myself. I felt that it was something that everyone can do. I believe that everyone has a creative side and this project gave us the opportunity to explore that side.
-Arryana Sandoval(Class of 2018)
